data.title: Redefining Higher Education Globally
data.meta_description: Enderun Colleges is one of the best Culinary Arts School, Hotel and Restaurant Management School, Business Administration School located in Taguig City.
data.text:
WELCOME TO

Enderun Colleges

Your Global Career Starts Here

Enderun Colleges provides you with an immersive learning environment with its industry-specific programs, highly experienced faculty, and extensive local and international internship placements. Since opening its doors to students in 2005, Enderun has helped students develop key competencies, independent thinking, and leadership skills that are in-demand by industry leaders worldwide.

Our Global Partners

In line with Enderun’s commitment to excellence, every college is partnered with top academic institutions in USA, France, and South Korea. This provides you with access to international-quality hospitality, culinary arts, business administration, entrepreneurship, economics, architecture, interior design, and sustainability programs right in the heart of Metro Manila.

Global Internship

Opportunities

The Office of Career Services supports Enderun’s goal of nurturing, training, and empowering students to excel in their chosen fields. We provide premiere programs, resources, and services that enable them to apply their academic experiences in a dynamic and global environment. From their first day of school, our students learn to balance rigorous academic schedule with practical training and internship requirements.

Our global academic and industry partners, ensure that we adhere to the highest international standards of academic excellence and professional industry practices.

Our Global Industry Partners

Enderun Colleges is also affiliated with over 800 industry partners in over thirty countries. As a result, Enderun students are provided with unique internship and career opportunities. No matter what your dream career, Enderun can help bridge the gap and take you from where you are to where you want to be.

33

COUNTRIES AS POSSIBLE INTERNSHIP DESTINATIONS

Australia, Canada, Czech Republic, China, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Lebanon, Malaysia, Maldives, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Qatar, Philippines, Portugal, Singapore, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Vietnam…and the list keeps on growing

994

GLOBAL INDUSTRY PARTNERS OFFERING INTERNSHIP AND POSSIBLE CAREER PLACEMENTS

Our Global Faculty

Students receive training from a roster of academic and industry professionals and learning figures in the industry.

Members of Enderun Colleges’ faculty reflect the school’s international scope and character. Drawn from all across the globe, the faculty members are a diverse group of academics, full-time professors, industry professionals, and prominent business leaders.

The Enderun Titans

Programs
